mapper.select: select t.userid, m.username, m.lat, m.lng, m.addr, m.gender, trunc(months_between(trunc(sysdate), birth)/12) as birth, m.no, t.pic, t.care_type, t.child_age, t.activity_type, t.desired_wage, t.area1, t.headcount, t.discussion, round((sysdate - t.last_edit) *1440) as last_edit, c.identi_status, c.school_status, c.license_status, c.crime_status from teacher t join member m on t.userid= m.userid join certification c on t.userid= c.userid where m.who = 'T'
